np.random.seed(42)
config = train_model.get_config()
regressor = KerasGClassifier(config, optimizer='adam', metrics=[],
    batch_size=32, epochs=30, seed=42)
scorer = SCORERS['accuracy']
train, test = next(KFold(n_splits=5).split(X, y))
assert np.array_equal(test, np.arange(154)), test
new_params = {'layers_0_Dense__config__kernel_initializer__config__seed': 0,
    'layers_1_Dense__config__kernel_initializer__config__seed': 0}
parameters = new_params
fit_params = {'shuffle': False}
got1 = _fit_and_score(regressor, X, y, scorer, train, test, verbose=0,
    parameters=parameters, fit_params=fit_params)
assert round(got1[0], 1) == 0.7, got1
